snippet: A gang of men believed to have robbed a bank and were fleeing authorities hurled cash from a vehicle on Wednesday, drawing people into the streets of Los Angeles.
abstract: Gang of men believed to have robbed a Los Angeles bank hurl cash from a speeding sport utility vehicle as they flee from sheriff's deputies, intending to draw people into the streets in the hope of blocking pursuit; two men surrender and two remain at large.
lead_paragraph: A gang of men believed to have robbed a bank and were fleeing authorities hurled cash from a vehicle on Wednesday, drawing people into the streets of Los Angeles.

headline.main: California: To Slow Chase, Robbery Suspects Toss Cash
headline.print_headline: California: To Slow Chase, Robbery Suspects Toss Cash

keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
keywords.name: subject
